description:
When your chain reaches next-level gunk status, it's time for a scrub. Fill the solvent reservoir, fasten it to the chain and rotate the cranks backward. The stiff-bristled rotating brushes take care of the rest.

  • Fluid reservoir holds 60ml of solvent
  • Magnet within the reservoir draws particles away from chain to prevent redistribution
  • Internal sponge prevents drips while cleaning
  • Burly, stiff brushes scrub chains clean
  • Ergonomic handle is comfortable to use
name: Park Tool CM-5.3 Cyclone Chain Scrubber
